name: Due Date Changer
description: An LTI for Instructure Canvas that allows you to quickly update all the due dates in your course.

SECRET_KEY.description: Flask Secret Key (Enter in a long string)

LTI_KEY.description: LTI consumer key entered when adding an LTI to Canvas

LTI_SECRET.description: LTI secret entered when adding an LTI to Canvas

ALLOWED_CANVAS_DOMAINS.description: List of Canvas domains that are whitelisted to use the tool: eg. ['canvas.instructure.com']

USE_HEROKU_CONFIG.description: needed to use the Heroku configuration
